languages.text: "А ведь вы правы — давно пора сделать палубы потише. Я обязательно распоряжусь о том, чтобы низшим чинам на корабле удалили связки".

traits.locale_text: "А ведь ты права! Давно следовала повырывать языки этим простолюдинам!"

languages.text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."
languages.original_text: "А ведь вы правы — давно пора сделать палубы потише. Я обязательно распоряжусь о том, чтобы низшим чинам на корабле удалили связки".

traits.locale_text: "You have a point, it is about time we made the decks quieter. I will order to have the lower ranks on the vessel stripped of their voice chords."
"You have a point, it is about time we made the decks quieter. I will order to have the lower ranks on the vessel stripped of their voice chords."
"You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."
"You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."
"You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

languages.text: “你的话很有道理，是时候让甲板安静些了。我会把那些低级船员的声带割掉。”
languages.original_text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

traits.locale_text: “你的话很有道理，是时候让甲板安静些了。我会把那些低级船员的声带割掉。”

languages.text: «Tiene razón, es hora de que las cubiertas sean más tranquilas. Haré que se extirpen las cuerdas vocales de los rangos inferiores».
languages.original_text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, es hora de que las cubiertas sean más tranquilas. Haré que se extirpen las cuerdas vocales de los rangos inferiores».

languages.text: 「一理あるな。そろそろ甲板をもっと静かにしてもいい頃だ。下層階級から声を剥奪するべきか」
languages.original_text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

traits.locale_text: 「一理あるな。そろそろ甲板をもっと静かにしてもいい頃だ。下層階級から声を剥奪するべきか」

languages.text: "Ihr habt nicht unrecht. Es wird Zeit, dass wir für mehr Ruhe auf den Decks sorgen. Ich lasse den niederen Rängen die Stimmbänder entfernen."
languages.original_text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt nicht unrecht. Es wird Zeit, dass wir für mehr Ruhe auf den Decks sorgen. Ich lasse den niederen Rängen die Stimmbänder entfernen."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, il est grand temps de les faire taire. Je vais faire retirer les cordes vocales des rangs inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, il est grand temps de les faire taire. Je vais faire retirer les cordes vocales des rangs inférieurs. »

languages.text: "Haklısın, güvertelerin sesini kısma vakti geldi. Söyleyeyim de düşük rütbelilerin ses tellerini söksünler."
languages.original_text: "You have a point, it's about time we made the decks quieter. I will have the lower ranks stripped of their vocal cords."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın, artık güvertelerin sessiz olması lazım. Söyleyeyim de düşük rütbelilerin ses tellerini söksünler."
